item.description:
Financial Independence and Security: a Seminar for Women

As a woman, you’re many things to many people: a mother, wife, daughter, coworker, boss. You’re educated, responsible and hard-working. You owe it to yourself to take charge of your future --especially when it comes to your finances!

We will also have a raffle, so bring your business cards! Light refreshments will be served, too.

As an added attraction, we have invited a woman who sells Italian designer handbags -- not knockoffs -- but without the designer prices! She buys direct and passes the savings on to you!

So come browse the latest in handbags, enter the raffle, and have a good time, all while learning how to build wealth and increase financial security.

Hope to see you there!

Cheers, Karen
617-650-8716
item.name: You owe it to yourself...
